duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the Senior Compliance Officer and Chief Compliance Officer with the administration of the Firm’s compliance infrastructure and oversight program.
Conduct investment adviser/investment company testing and forensic analysis on a daily, monthly, and quarterly basis.
Prepare fund performance calculations and create performance summaries.
Review monthly and quarterly updates to the website for accuracy.
Assist with compliance review of client RFP’s, RFI’s, and due diligence questionnaires.
Keep current on developments in the IA/IC regulatory space.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in related fields (accounting, finance, business, etc.)
